name: PoolFactory
description: Pool factory. it relies on a system of sub-factories which are responsible for the creation of underlying staking and reward modules. This primary factory calls each module factory and assembles the overall Pool contract. this contract also manages various privileged platform settings including treasury address, fee amount, and module factory whitelist. this implements the Pool factory contract which allows any user to easily configure and deploy their own Pool.

eventDecorators.name: ControlTransferred
eventDecorators.description: Whenever a new child contract is deployed, a `NewContract` event containing the new child contract address MUST be emitted.

eventDecorators.name: FeeUpdated
eventDecorators.description: Whenever a new child contract is deployed, a `NewContract` event containing the new child contract address MUST be emitted.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: Whenever a new child contract is deployed, a `NewContract` event containing the new child contract address MUST be emitted.

eventDecorators.name: PoolCreated
eventDecorators.description: Whenever a new child contract is deployed, a `NewContract` event containing the new child contract address MUST be emitted.

eventDecorators.name: TreasuryUpdated
eventDecorators.description: Whenever a new child contract is deployed, a `NewContract` event containing the new child contract address MUST be emitted.

eventDecorators.name: WhitelistUpdated
eventDecorators.description: Whenever a new child contract is deployed, a `NewContract` event containing the new child contract address MUST be emitted.

functionDecorators.name: controller
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current controller.

returnDecorators.description: total number of Pools created by the factory.

parameterDecorators.name: staking
parameterDecorators.description: address of factory that will be used to create staking module.

parameterDecorators.name: reward
parameterDecorators.description: address of factory that will be used to create reward module.

parameterDecorators.name: stakingdata
parameterDecorators.description: construction data for staking module factory.

parameterDecorators.name: rewarddata
parameterDecorators.description: construction data for reward module factory.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: setFee
functionDecorators.description: update the global GYSR spending fee.

parameterDecorators.name: fee_
parameterDecorators.description: new value for GYSR spending fee.

functionDecorators.name: setWhitelist
functionDecorators.description: set the whitelist status of a module factory.

functionDecorators.name: transferControl
functionDecorators.description: Transfers control of the contract to a new account (`newController`). Can only be called by the owner.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). This can include renouncing ownership by transferring to the zero address. Can only be called by the current owner.
